name: EngageSphere
description: Sample project with basic 'backend' and frontend running Cypress tests on GitHub Actions.

scripts.lint: npx eslint frontend/src/**/*.js && npx eslint frontend/src/serviceWorker.js && eslint frontend/src/index.js && eslint frontend/src/App.js && eslint frontend/cypress/support/component.js && eslint backend/db/index.js && eslint backend/db/staticCustomers.js && npx eslint backend/server.js && npx eslint cypress/**/*.js && npx eslint cypress.config.js
scripts.lint:fix: npx eslint frontend/src/**/*.js --fix && npx eslint frontend/src/serviceWorker.js --fix && eslint frontend/src/index.js --fix && eslint frontend/src/App.js --fix && eslint frontend/cypress/support/component.js --fix && eslint backend/db/index.js --fix && eslint backend/db/staticCustomers.js --fix && npx eslint backend/server.js --fix && npx eslint cypress/**/*.js --fix && npx eslint cypress.config.js --fix
scripts.test: npm run test:api:with:servers && npm run test:frontend:component && npm run test:frontend:gui:with:servers

author: Walmyr Filho <wlsf82@gmail.com> (https://walmyr.dev)
